name: Paylotto
description:
Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move

 Click to shoot

Space to roll the die when you are touching it and depending on where you are.

Defeating enemies buys you more time, and getting hit or the dice getting hit makes you lose time.

Garish carpet and all, you are a stack of poker chips named Pokey who has to fight his way through the various casino attractions and take the payload, which is a dice, to the end of the map.  When you move the payload, it also switches your weapon. 

Shoutout to my little bro for all the art. he's pretty cool. The scratch engine was used to make this game and this is for the 2022 GMTK game jam.
